thread.title: The Top 10 Sunglasses for Spring - Check out the hottest new styles and latest trends, just in time for your next trip
thread.title_full: The Top 10 Sunglasses for Spring - Check out the hottest new styles and latest trends, just in time for your next trip

author: Noelle Buhidar
title: The Top 10 Sunglasses for Spring - Check out the hottest new styles and latest trends, just in time for your next trip
text:
Oakley Holbrook Metal – $220 

Go ahead and set your out-of-office message now. It’s decided. Life is about spontaneity, and you deserve that spur-of-the-moment staycation. Now all you need are the right shades. The exclusive Ray-Ban Flat Lens is brand-new and will get you compliments pretty much everywhere thanks to the flat lenses, which have a fresh and on-trend look. Inspired by the pioneering spirit of the past, the Ray-Ban General is bold, tough and sharp—a classic style that’s ready for anything. 
Ray-Ban General – $210 

Festival season is a time to see and be seen—just look up #Coachella on Instagram for proof. These Michael Kors sunglasses are great for any mood, and the timeless design will have you feeling chic and oh-so sleek during that Local Natives set. The Ray-Bans are totally retro. This look has been worn by legendary musicians and is inspired by the ’60s counterculture. This iconic and unisex frame makes a striking impression while you jam to your favorite tunes. 
Ray-Ban Round Metal – $200 

Headed abroad? Bon voyage. Chances are you’re going to be doing a lot of daytime excursions. Explore the wonders in these sunglasses, which are the perfect pairs for sightseeing. Vogue’s shades merge state-of-the-art design with superior quality; designed for the young at heart, the innovative frames complete a contemporary look. Persol sunglasses are favorites among tastemakers and celebrities because of their impeccable fit and clarity. Not only are these Persol frames unique, but the crystal-tempered lenses provide protection with distortion-free vision. 
Persol Sunglasses – $390 

Found your perfect pair of sunglasses? Rock on. To sweeten the purchase, Sunglass Hut offers stellar customer service and free two-day shipping. You can go to the store for free adjustments and custom cleaning anytime. And if you aren’t happy with your shades, you have a solid 90 days to return them. So now the only question is: where to? 

This post is sponsored by Sunglass Hut, the ultimate destination for sunglasses, from premium fashion frames to stylish sport shades. By
